code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Typography,Box}from"@mui/material";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{fetchFromAPI}from"../utils/fetchFromAPI";import{Videos}from"./";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchFeed=()=>{const[videos,setVideos]=useState(null);const{searchTerm}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{fetchFromAPI("search?part=snippet&q=".concat(searchTerm)).then(data=>setVideos(data.items));},[searchTerm]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{p:2,minHeight:"95vh",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"h4",fontWeight:900,color:"white",mb:3,ml:{sm:"100px"},children:["Search Results for ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:"#FC1503"},children:searchTerm})," videos"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{display:"flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{mr:{sm:'100px'}}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Videos,{videos:videos})]})]});};export default SearchFeed;
